AILanguagePackProtocol Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in AILanguagePackProtocol.h

– refresh: required method

refreshes the overview file containing the list of languages available in the server and also downloads the language pack based on the user preferred ui locale

- (void)refresh:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( AILPRefreshStatus refreshResult , NSError *_Nullable error ))completionHandler

Parameters

:

completion handler with refresh status and error if refresh failed

Declared In

AILanguagePackProtocol.h

– activate: required method

activates the Language Pack downloaded for the preferred ui locale

- (void)activate:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( AILPActivateStatus activatedStatus , NSError *_Nullable error ))completionHandler

Parameters

:

completion handler with activate status and error if activate failed

Declared In

AILanguagePackProtocol.h

– localizedStringForKey: required method

returns the localized string from cloud bundle if it not there in cloud will look in main bundle if not found will return the key

- (nullable NSString *)localizedStringForKey:(NSString *_Nonnull)key

Declared In

AILanguagePackProtocol.h
